title: Chicago Music Nexus Returning in 2025 With Interactive Workshops and Expanded Programming

title: ICON Collective Alumni Rally to Host Tribute Club Night Following School's Closure
description: Instructors and graduates of ICON will rave at a downtown Los Angeles warehouse to honor the electronic music production school, which closed after filing for bankruptcy.

title: Jack White Celebrates Trump and Elon Musk’s Breakup: “More Popcorn Gruppenfuehrer!”
description: White captioned a photo of Musk, Trump, and Kanye West, writing: "3 f*cking nazi clowns collapsing under the weight of their own unchecked egos." Jack White Celebrates Trump and Elon Musk’s Breakup: “More Popcorn Gruppenfuehrer!” Scoop Harrison
